p: The traditional use of Millettia species includes antibacterial, anti-tumour, insecticidal, pesticidal, piscicidal ( Sritularak and Likhitwitayawuid, 2006), antispasmodial, chemopreventive ( Marco et al., 2017) joint pain, rheumatoid arthritis, amenorrhea, tuberculosis, etc. Most of them are used in the production of biodiesel ( Madhu et al., 2016).
